name: Man's Survival at Stake, Brunhilde
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), [COST][Counter-Blast]2 & Soul-Blast]1 card with "Brunhilde" in its card name], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one <Man> and <Valkyrie> card each from among them, call them to (RC), and shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Soul-Blast]1], choose two of your <Man> or <Valkyrie>, and they get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Watching for an Opportunity, Brunhilde
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding on "The Choice for Victory, Brunhilde", reveal the top card of your deck, and if that grade 2 or less normal unit card is a <Man> or <Valkyrie>, call it to (RC), and if not, put it on the top of your deck or into your soul.

name: The Choice for Victory, Brunhilde
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed by riding on "Brunhilde", [COST][Soul-Blast]1], look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top or bottom of your deck, and draw a card.

name: Brunhilde
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Seeking the Strongest Opponent, Lü Bu
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit is boosted by a <Valkyrie>, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Prodigious Love, Adam
effect: [CONT](GC):If your grade 3 or greater vanguard is a <Man> or <Valkyrie>, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.

name: Now in His Prime, Kojiro Sasaki
Devoting Herself, Randgriz
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard with "Lü Bu" in its card name, if your grade 3 or greater vanguard is a unit with "Lü Bu" in its card name or a <Valkyrie>, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], and until end of that battle, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC), they must call two or more at the same time.

name: Devoting Herself, Reginleif
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a rear-guard with "Adam" in its card name, if your grade 3 or greater vanguard is a unit with "Adam" in its card name or a <Valkyrie>, [COST][Counter-Blast]1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. At the end of that battle, return that boosted unit to your hand.

name: Wishing for Man's Victory, Göll
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)
[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][discard a card from your hand], choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle.

name: The Moment History is Transformed
effect:
(You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)
Additional Effect - Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn!

name: The "Strongest" by Nature
effect:
(When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
[CONT]:You may have up to eight "The "Strongest" by Nature" in your deck.

name: Men Battle with their Fists
effect:
(When revealed as a trigger, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
[CONT]:You may have up to eight "Men Battle with their Fists" in your deck.

name: Battle in the Abyss
effect:
(When revealed as a trigger, draw a card! Then, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn!)
[CONT]:You may have up to eight "Battle in the Abyss" in your deck.

name: Adoring Gaze
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn! Then, if the number of cards in your damage zone is equal to or more than your opponent's, choose a card from your damage zone, and heal it!)
